content.question: A. Using the location shown in Image 2, describe the pilgrimage location in terms of sequent occupance. B. Explain how the global population distribution of a universalizing religion relates to the religion’s place of origin. C. Using the location shown in Image 1, explain how a pilgrimage site can create cultural convergence among peoples of different ethnicities. D. Explain ONE way that expansion diffusion can account for the patterns of international travel to pilgrimage locations. E. Explain ONE way that conflicts over the control of pilgrimage sites can lead to the devolution of a state.
